item.description:
Meet at 930 am at the derby shops in Hingham.......leave at 10 am

here are the details off the flyer.............



Join us for the 21st Annual
Gregory, Kieseling Sweetsir
Original Daytime
Halloween
Motorcycle Run!
All Proceeds to Benefit The Bridge Center (Formally Handi Kids)
Sunday October 11, 2009
Rain Date October 12, 2009
Registration 10am â€“ 1pm
Ride Starts at 1pm
Registration: $20.00 for Riders
$15.00 for Passengers
Start at 437 Turnpike St. (route 138) in Canton.
End at Fusion 5 (105 Washington St. in Foxborough
Enjoy coffee, donuts and music before the ride followed a post ride BBQ with raffles, prizes for best costume and a cash bar!
SEE YOU THERE!
